languages.text: Убедил{mf||а} мятежников во главе с Арильдом сложить оружие и прекратить ослепления.
Convinced the rebels led by Aryld to lay down their arms and stop blinding people.
languages.original_text: Убедил{mf||а} мятежников во главе с Арильдом сложить оружие и прекратить ослепления.

traits.locale_text: Convinced the rebels led by Aryld to lay down their arms and stop blinding people.

languages.text: 你说服艾瑞德的叛军放下了武器，不再弄瞎别人的眼睛。
languages.original_text: Convinced the rebels led by Aryld to lay down their arms and stop blinding people.

traits.locale_text: 你说服艾瑞德的叛军放下了武器，不再弄瞎别人的眼睛。

languages.text: Has convencido a los rebeldes liderados por Aryld de que abandonaran las armas y dejaran de cegar a la gente.
languages.original_text: Convinced the rebels led by Aryld to lay down their arms and stop blinding people.

traits.locale_text: Has convencido a los rebeldes liderados por Aryld de que abandonaran las armas y dejaran de cegar a la gente.

languages.text: アリルド率いる反乱軍に武器を捨てさせ、人々の目をくらませるのをやめさせた。
languages.original_text: Convinced the rebels led by Aryld to lay down their arms and stop blinding people.

traits.locale_text: アリルド率いる反乱軍に武器を捨てさせ、人々の目をくらませるのをやめさせた。

languages.text: Vous avez convaincu les rebelles menés par Aryld de déposer les armes et de cesser d'aveugler les gens.
languages.original_text: Convinced the rebels led by Aryld to lay down their arms and stop blinding people.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez convaincu les rebelles menés par Aryld de déposer les armes et de cesser d'aveugler les gens.

languages.text: Die Rebellen unter der Führung von Aryld überzeugt, die Waffen niederzulegen und niemanden mehr zu blenden.
languages.original_text: Convinced the rebels led by Aryld to lay down their arms and stop blinding people.

traits.locale_text: Die Rebellen unter der Führung von Aryld überzeugt, die Waffen niederzulegen und niemanden mehr zu blenden.

languages.text: Aryld önderliğindeki isyancıları silahlarını bırakmaya ikna edip insanları kör etmekten vazgeçirdin.
languages.original_text: Convinced the rebels led by Aryld to lay down their arms and stop blinding people.

traits.locale_text: Aryld önderliğindeki isyancıları silahlarını bırakmaya ikna edip insanları kör etmekten vazgeçirdin.
